account_name.description: The name of the account to add to the database.

account_type.description: Type of account to create: either a single user or an AAD group. Defaults to `user`.

database.description: The name of the database to add the account.

object_id.description: Azure AD object ID for the account.

port.description: Port to connect to the database server. Defaults to `1433`.

role.description: The role the account should get (e.g. owner, reader, etc.). Defaults to `reader`.

sql_server_dns.description: The DNS name of the SQL server to add the account.

block.description:
`sqlsso_mssql_server_aad_account` enables AAD authentication for an Azure MS SQL server.

For this to work terraform should be run for the configured **Active Directory Admin** account, not the SQL Server Admin as AD users can only be administered with the AD Admin account.
